filesystem.name: list_files
filesystem.note: Lists all files in the current directory with detailed information.

filesystem.name: show_hidden_files
filesystem.note: Displays all files, including hidden ones, in the current directory.

filesystem.name: find_file
filesystem.note: Searches for a file with the given name in the current directory and subdirectories.

filesystem.name: copy_file
filesystem.note: Copies a file from the source path to the destination path.

filesystem.name: move_file
filesystem.note: Moves a file from the source path to the destination path.

search.name: search_in_files
search.note: Recursively searches for a term within files in the current directory.

system.name: check_disk_usage
system.note: Displays disk usage for files and directories in human-readable format.

system.name: show_running_processes
system.note: Displays the currently running processes with resource usage.

system.name: kill_process
system.note: Terminates a process with the given process ID (PID).
